name: 22/23 Y1C - Team 8 - Box Baby Adventures
description:
Find your box family!

After an accident in a box warehouse, some cardboard boxes have turned into sentient beings, with newly gained abilities like horizontal movement, variable jump height, and a 5-directional dash! It also turns out that the sentient boxes are part of a family now...  Then after some time, when the warehouse the boxes live in gets bankrupt, the 'box family' gets separated. You are the baby box of that family, and your goal is to find your other family members again.

Play through five exciting levels and come across pressure plates & gates, jump pads, destructible platforms, and wall-jumpable walls!

The controls and credits can be found in the main menu.

(There may be easter eggs hidden in every level...)

Made as a student project for Breda University of Applied Sciences, Year 1, Block C.
